timeline.message: some minor looks at optimizing that didn't bear a lot of fruit

timeline.bodyText: This will shock/ horrify you, but the formatters are not thread safe.  Make them fields instead of statics.
timeline.author: lbergelson

timeline.bodyText: This one is the most funny.
timeline.author: lbergelson

timeline.bodyText: these should technically probably be lowercase, but eh
timeline.author: lbergelson

replies.bodyText: I leave them uppercase to show my excitement for decimal formatting...
replies.author: jamesemery
